name: Draco
description: Athenian legislator known for his harsh laws

description: unifying King of Denmark and Norway

description: French physician and reformer (but not inventor)

description: American women's rights (and clothing reform) activist

description: American general with distinctive facial hair

name: William Russell Frisbie
description: American pie baker (and pie tin maker)
